Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: Kaadu meqe saareey, meqe xagar xagó (galab-xagó) yoh ab ellecabô maray yok lakal yamaatu waah addal Qhiyaamah ayrô fanah
Kaadu ku-naqoosak naqiim deqsita Jannat nagra marat yoo hayis
Kaadu yi-abbah dambi cab, diggah usuk makkoote marak numuk teynah sugek
Kaadu yoo mawacarriysin ginó inkih magooqak cisab kee galtoh ugussa ayrò (Qhiyaamah ayro kinnuk)
Woh gibdi ayróy maaluu kee xaylo tu edde xiqe wayta kinni
Yallâ fanah saytun lubbi luk yemeete num akke waytek, koroosannuu kee munaafiqhinnuk
Kaadu Yallak meesiteeh, kay taaqatal kaâ fanah yufkune marah Jannat xayyoysimaah ken yaybulleenih Qhiyaamah ayrò
Kaadu jaciim deqsitta girá koroosite maray tirtô gitak makkoote yaybulleenih
Kaadu ken sahitak:sin yallittey aqbudak sugteeni annih teetiiy? Keenik iyyan
Yallak kalah aqbudak sugteenim Yallih digaalák sin cattaa hinnay is isi nafsi Yallih digaalák cattaa
Tokkel ken (numtinwwellittee kee koros kinnuk) kee tirtô gitak makkoote mara xambabbaqqa ken heenih jahannamat foocah (neefih) qambisiman
Kaadu ibliis qande (kaa kataate mara kinnuk) inkih teetit qambisimta
Koros kee usun aqbudak sugeenim tet addal anuk keemaaritak ittak iyyaanah
Yallal xiibitna immay nanu diggah addunyal baxxaqqa itta makoy qellu sinnih addat sugne itta koros
Nanu Ginô Rabbit sin massosne waqdi Qibaadal
Kaadu tirtô gitak nee makkossem matan umeyniitiy Yallak kalih im naqbudeemih neh secte akke waytek
A-saaku shafaaqatta neh takkeeh, Yallih digaalak nee cattaamak num mannu
Kaadu kacnoytah yan kataysay neh xuwaawa (allaaqala) mannu
Maganey!inki adda addunyâ fanah madaara luk sugnaamal yeemene maray naggoowê loowot gacak nen iyyan
Diggah too Nabii Ibraahim xaaguy taturet kaskassoowa marah astá tan, kaadu keenik ama xaagu yoobbe marak maggom yeemene mara makko
Kaadu diggah Nabiyow ku-Rabbi usuk mayso-li xuwaw-li kinni
Nabii Nuuc mari sinni farmoyta Nuuc dirabboyseeh, wohul farmoytit inkih dirabboyse mara yekken
Ken toobokoyti Nabii Nuuc Yallak mameesittaanaa?keenik iyye waqdi
Diggah anu siinih amaanat-le farmoyta kinniyo edde rubsumem sin gudduysaamal
Toysa Yallak meesitaay yi-amri oggola
Kaadu Yallih farmo sin gudduysaamal galtó sin messera, yi-galtó numul matanaay numul messera ginô Rabbil essera yoo akke waytek
Toysa Yallak meesitaay yi-amri oggola
Anninnal koo nummasnaah koo katatnaah sinaamak boola-le mari koo kataate way? Kaak iyyen kay mari
